Package it.polimi.dei.provafinale.carcassone.model

Class Summary
AbstractMap  
AbstractPlayer  
AbstractTile  
CardinalPositionTest This test is created for testing the functionalities of the CardinalPosition class.
ColorTest This test controls that all the public methods of Color class work.
ConnectionTypeTest  
Deck This class represent the deck like a collection of tiles.
DeckBuilder This class build a deck from a file.
DeckBuilderTest  
DeckTest  
DisplayedMap This class represent a map displayed on the output.
DisplayedMapTest  
DisplayedPlayer This class represent a displayed player during the game.
DisplayedTile This class contains information of a tile to display.
DisplayedTileTest  
FieldTypeTest This test allows to control that all the functionalities of FieldType are correctly implemented.
Game This class model all game.
GameTest  
MapBuilder This class create the map with the first tile.
ModelMap This class contains all informations about a map.
ModelMapTest  
ModelPlayer This class represent a player, not a client.
ModelPlayerTest  
ModelTile The class models the Tile.
ModelTileTest  
PieceOfTrack This class model a piece of track.
PieceOfTrackTest  
PlacedTile This class model the tile placed in the map.
Position Position class represents the position of an element (for example a Tile) that is calculated from the first Tile placed in a map as in a Cartesian Diagram.
PositionTest This test class tests the methods of the Position class.
RemovedPlayer This class represent a removed player.
TileArea This Field class represent the whole informations contained in a field, that is one of the four parts of a Tile.
TileAreaTest This test class tests the methods of the Field class.
TileConnection  
TileConnectionTest  
Track This class represent a track, a structure to save the elements (street or city) connected.
TrackTest  
 

Enum Summary
CardinalPosition This enumeration Cardinal Position is created for modeling the possibles representations of Cardinal Positions.
Color This Enum class allows to manage the color of the players.
ConnectionType This enumeration is created to manage the possibility in a TileConnection of having only two values of presence and no presence.
FieldType This enumeration represents the types of fields that can be placed in an area of a tile.
